con:request.name: 2. RetrieveFareQuote
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:RetrieveFareQuote> <tem:RetrieveFareQuoteRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request">${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote"/> <rad:IataNumberOfRequestor xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">${#TestSuite#IATANumber}</rad:IataNumberOfRequestor> <rad:CorporationID xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">0</rad:CorporationID> <rad:FareFilterMethod xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">NoCombinabilityAllFares</rad:FareFilterMethod> <rad:FareGroupMethod xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">FareClassFareBasis</rad:FareGroupMethod> <rad:InventoryFilterMethod xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">All</rad:InventoryFilterMethod> <rad:FareQuoteDetails xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote"> <rad:FareQuoteDetail> <rad:Origin>${#TestSuite#Origin}</rad:Origin> <rad:Destination>${#TestSuite#Destination}</rad:Destination> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroups>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroups> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsAsRule>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsAsRule> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForFrom>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForFrom> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForTo>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForTo> <rad:DateOfDeparture>${#TestSuite#DepartureDate}</rad:DateOfDeparture> <rad:FareTypeCategory>${#TestSuite#ID}</rad:FareTypeCategory> <rad:FareClass xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:FareBasisCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:Cabin xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:LFID>-1</rad:LFID> <rad:OperatingCarrierCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:MarketingCarrierCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:NumberOfDaysBefore>0</rad:NumberOfDaysBefore> <rad:NumberOfDaysAfter>0</rad:NumberOfDaysAfter> <rad:LanguageCode>en</rad:LanguageCode> <rad:TicketPackageID xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:FareQuoteRequestInfos> <rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo> <rad:PassengerTypeID>${#TestSuite#ID}</rad:PassengerTypeID> <rad:TotalSeatsRequired>${#TestSuite#ID}</rad:TotalSeatsRequired> </rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo> </rad:FareQuoteRequestInfos> </rad:FareQuoteDetail> </rad:FareQuoteDetails> <rad:ProfileId xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">0</rad:ProfileId> </tem:RetrieveFareQuoteRequest> </tem:RetrieveFareQuote> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

i:nil="true"/> <a:Address> <a:Address1 i:nil="true"/> <a:Address2 i:nil="true"/> <a:City i:nil="true"/> <a:State i:nil="true"/> <a:Postal i:nil="true"/> <a:Country i:nil="true"/> <a:CountryCode <a:NationalityLaguageID>${#TestSuite#ID}</a:NationalityLaguageID> <a:RelationType>Self</a:RelationType> <a:WBCID>-2147483648</a:WBCID> <a:PTCID>1</a:PTCID> <a:PTC>${#TestSuite#p_PTC}</a:PTC> <a:TravelsWithPersonOrgID>-1</a:TravelsWithPersonOrgID> <a:RedressNumber i:nil="true"/> <a:KnownTravelerNumber i:nil="true"/> <a:MarketingOptIn>true</a:MarketingOptIn> <a:UseInventory>true</a:UseInventory> <a:Address> <a:Address1 i:nil="true"/> <a:Address2 i:nil="true"/> <a:City i:nil="true"/> <a:State i:nil="true"/> <a:Postal i:nil="true"/> <a:Country>0</a:Country> <a:CountryCode i:nil="true"/> <a:AreaCode i:nil="true"/> <a:PhoneNumber i:nil="true"/> <a:Display i:nil="true"/> </a:Address> <a:Company i:nil="true"/> <a:Comments i:nil="true"/> <a:Passport i:nil="true"/> <a:Nationality>${#TestSuite#p_Nationality}</a:Nationality> <a:ProfileId>-21474836</a:ProfileId> <a:IsPrimaryPassenger>true</a:IsPrimaryPassenger> <a:ContactInfos i:nil="true"/> <a:FrequentFlyerNumber i:nil="true"/> <a:Suffix i:nil="true"/> </a:Person> </a:Passengers> <a:Segments> <a:Segment> <a:PersonOrgID>${#TestSuite#PersonOrgID}</a:PersonOrgID> <a:FareInformationID>${#TestCase#fareid}</a:FareInformationID> <a:MarketingCode>${#TestSuite#ID}</a:MarketingCode> <a:StoreFrontID>${#TestSuite#ID}</a:StoreFrontID> <a:RecordLocator i:nil="true"/> con:request.name: 4 AssessPaymentFee
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Fees.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AssessPaymentMethodFees> <!--Optional:--> <tem:AssessPaymentMethodFeesRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode> <rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>${#TestSuite#carriercode}</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress>::1</rad:ClientIPAddress> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>radixx</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:PaymentsToAssessFee> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad1:PaymentToAssessFee> <rad1:PaymentMethod>${#TestSuite#PaymentMethodTA}</rad1:PaymentMethod> <rad1:CardNumber xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:PaymentAmount>${3 SummaryPNR - Get Summary#Response#declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Response'; declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; //ns1:SummaryPNRResponse[1]/ns1:SummaryPNRResult[1]/a:ReservationBalance[1]}</rad1:PaymentAmount> </rad1:PaymentToAssessFee> </rad1:PaymentsToAssessFee> </tem:AssessPaymentMethodFeesRequest> </tem:AssessPaymentMethodFees> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 5 CreatePNR (Commit)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:CreatePNR>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <tem:CreatePnrRequest>\r <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID>\r <rad:CarrierCodes>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <rad:CarrierCode>\r <rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>${#TestSuite#carriercode}</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>\r </rad:CarrierCode>\r </rad:CarrierCodes>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad:ClientIPAddress xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad:HistoricUserName xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/>\r <rad1:ActionType>CommitSummary</rad1:ActionType>\r <rad1:ReservationInfo>\r <rad:SeriesNumber>299</rad:SeriesNumber>\r <rad:ConfirmationNumber xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/>\r </rad1:ReservationInfo>\r </tem:CreatePnrRequest>\r </tem:CreatePNR>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
